content: this crochet pattern contains a very detailed description on how to create the toy with a great amount of images showing the step by step process the height of the toy is 5 1 inches materials & tools yarn - yarn art jeans - 50g/160m 55% cotton 45% polyacrylic pink color 59 - a little yellow color 35 - a little red color 90 - a little sectional dyed yarn - a little hook - 2 mm self-adhesive eyes - 15 mm stuffing poly fiber fill or other markers sewing needle glue the digital pattern is available in eng/rus intermediate i hope you liked my master class and everything was clear please feel free to contact me if necessary thank you very much
